attributes.action: Introduce laws against all scientific experiments aimed at reducing  sunlight .
attributes.additional_details: Blocking or reducing sun light levels in the UK should be considered a crime against humanity and therefore should be prevented at all costs.
attributes.background: Introduce laws against scientific experiments aimed at reducing sunlight in the name of an imminent climate crisis that does not exist.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign the following petition, which calls for similar action:

Make all forms of 'geo-engineering' affecting the environment illegal
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/701963
